subject: Mental Health
title: Bethlem Royal Hospital: Bedlam
description: A short lesson to help you apply Bethlem Royal Hospital: Bedlam.

hook.text: London's Bethlem Hospital was so horrific its name became a word for chaos: bedlam.

buildup.text: Founded in 1247, it became notorious for chaining patients and treating them as spectacles.

discovery.text: Visitors paid a penny to watch patients as entertainment, like a human zoo.

twist.text: Treatments included ice baths, bloodletting, and spinning chairs meant to restore sanity.

climax.text: Bedlam symbolized how society warehoused the mentally ill rather than healing them.

punchline.text: We named chaos after our cruelty.

quiz.question: What became of the name Bethlem (Bedlam)?
options: It became a word meaning chaos and confusion
